name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Python is a versatile and popular programming language known for  applications,including web development and more.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system that is widely used for storing, managing, and retrieving data.

name: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learning the C programming language is an excellent starting point for anyone interested in computer programming.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Learning about algorithms is fundamental in computer science and programming. Algorithms are step-by-step procedures for solving problems.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: C++ is a powerful programming language commonly used for various software development applications, including system software and more.

name: Software Engineering
details: Software engineering is the systematic approach to designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Problem-solving is a crucial skill in software engineering and computer science. It involves finding efficient solutions to real-world problems.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Basic data structures are fundamental building blocks in computer science and software engineering.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is one of the leading cloud computing platforms, offering a wide range of services for hosting and more in the cloud.
